ul.li: check if there's a request
generate tokens
create cdc generation
insert cdc gen data

div.p:
booting_node: node ID
tokens: list of tokens
cdc gen UUID: UUID

ul.li: global barrier (wait until cdc gen data is present on every node)
create cdc generation timestamp
commit cdc gen
insert booting_node's tokens as pending into token ring
set token ring to write_both_read_old state
global barrier (waiting until all coordinators start writing to both replica sets)
execute streaming
set token ring to write_both_read_new state
global barrier (waiting until all coordinators start reading from new replica sets)
change booting_node's tokens to normal in the token ring
set token ring to normal state
change leaving node's tokens to leaving in the token ring

set token ring state to write_both_read_old
note: here "old" means including the leaving tokens
in bootstrap "old" means excluding the pending tokens\
global barrier (wait until all coordinators start writing to both replica sets)
execute streaming

set token ring to write_both_read_new state
note: "new" means excluding leaving tokens
global barrier (wait until all coordinators start reading from new replica sets)
remove leaving_node's tokens from the token ring
set token ring to normal state
check if current cdc gen is not optimal, if it's not:
create cdc generation
insert cdc gen data
global barrier (wait until cdc gen data is present on every node)
create cdc generation timestamp
commit cdc gen
